title: Fiskars SoftGrip Detail Craft Knife - 8" Exacto Knife for Crafting - Multi-Use Exacto Blade Included with Protective Cover
description: A great choice for daily detail cutting, Fiskars Craft Knife offered in Softgrip boasts a sturdy design strong enough to withstand virtually any kind of use. Cut paper, cardstock, thin plastic, photos, canvas and more with a knife featuring a die-cast handle enhanced with Softgrip for improved comfort and control. In addition, an included blade cap helps improve safety. Exacto knife compatible with most standard blades, this versatile knife ensures you can always use the blade that’s right for your materials and project.
